      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static boolean canBeSubtracted(char[] ch, java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,java.lang.String> substractMap, int i) 
      private static void checkIfCurrentCharAllowedToRepeat(java.lang.Character c)
      Currently D, V, L are not allowed to repeat.
      private static boolean isRomanNumeral(java.lang.String roman)
      Checks if input is a Roman numeral
      static boolean validate(java.lang.String roman)
      Performs below validation on Roman Numerals:
      1- Validation for repeats.
      private static boolean validateRepeats(java.lang.String romanString)
      Performs below validations:
      1- The symbols "I", "X", "C", and "M" can be repeated three times in succession, but no more.
      private static boolean validateSubtracts(java.lang.String roman)
      Performs below validations:
      1- "I" can be subtracted from "V" and "X" only.
      2- "X" can be subtracted from "L" and "C" only.
      3- "C" can be subtracted from "D" and "M" only.
      4- "V", "L", and "D" can never be subtracted.
      5- Only one small-value symbol may be subtracted from any large-value symbol.

      • validateRepeats

        private static boolean validateRepeats(java.lang.String romanString)
                                throws CustomException
        Performs below validations:
        1- The symbols "I", "X", "C", and "M" can be repeated three times in succession, but no more. They may appear four times if the third and fourth are separated by a smaller value, such as XXXIX
        2- "D", "L", and "V" can never be repeated.
        Parameters:
        romanString -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        CustomException

      • checkIfCurrentCharAllowedToRepeat

        private static void checkIfCurrentCharAllowedToRepeat(java.lang.Character c)
                                               throws CustomException
        Currently D, V, L are not allowed to repeat. In future this method can be update to disallow more Characters.
        Parameters:
        c -
        Throws:
        CustomException

      • validateSubtracts

        private static boolean validateSubtracts(java.lang.String roman)
                                  throws CustomException
        Performs below validations:
        1- "I" can be subtracted from "V" and "X" only.
        2- "X" can be subtracted from "L" and "C" only.
        3- "C" can be subtracted from "D" and "M" only.
        4- "V", "L", and "D" can never be subtracted.
        5- Only one small-value symbol may be subtracted from any large-value symbol.
        Parameters:
        roman -
        Throws:
        CustomException
